data.name: اکسل
data.description: We strive to improve the efficiency and productivity of trucking industry by using technology. This will in turn have a long term effect on the growth of the industry and economy as a whole. AXLE uses technology to bring shippers and owner-operators together. These technologies include automation of trip generation, automation of tracking and in turn insuring the safety of the driver. In near future AXLE will be integrating with your company's ERP system to offer you easier and faster dispatch.
